Plot long profile for a DRV

plot_drv.Rd

Plot long profile for a DRV

plot_drv(name = NULL, case.list = NULL, case.desc = case.list,
  sobek.project = NULL, param = "discharge", lt.by = "zustand",
  color.by = "vgf", facet.by = NULL, compare.by = "zustand",
  cmp.sort = FALSE, group.by = compare.by, color.name = "Farbe",
  lt.name = "Linienart", delta = TRUE, reserve.x = FALSE,
  x.lab = "Lage (KM)", y.lab = ifelse(param == "discharge",
  "Abfluss (m³/s)", "Wasserstand (m+NHN)"), to.upstream = 0,
  to.downstream = 0, y2.scale = NULL, y2.tick1 = NULL,
  plot.title = NULL, text.size = 12, text.x.top.angle = 90L,
  text.x.top.size = 8L, text.x.bottom.angle = 0L, ntick.x = 10L,
  a.fill = exl_std[3], a.alpha = 0.1, overlap = NULL,
  master.tbl = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

case.list

List of cases to plot, default is all
case.desc

Standard naming of case.list
sobek.project

Path to sobek project
param

dicharge/waterlevel
lt.by

Linetype defining by this value
color.by

Coloring by this value
facet.by

Facetting by this value
compare.by

Calculating delta by this value. Default 'zustand'
cmp.sort

Should comparing parameter be sorted. Default is FALSE
group.by

Groupping for delta calculation
color.name

Name of color in the legend
lt.name

Name of linetype in the legend
delta

Should delta also plotted?
reserve.x

Logical. If TRUE the x-axis will be reserved
x.lab

x-axis label
y.lab

y-axis label
to.upstream

distance (km) to upstream of the DRV to be included in the graphic
to.downstream

distance (km) to downstream of the DRV to be included in the graphic
y2.scale

scale of y2-axis. Default value will be automatic calculated.
y2.tick1

The value of the first tick on the y2-axis. Using this and y2.scale to make y2-axis looks nice.
plot.title

Title of the graphic
text.size

Size of text
text.x.top.angle

Angle of text at top
text.x.bottom.angle

Angle of text at bottom
ntick.x

Minimum number of ticks on x-axis. Default = 10
a.fill

Fill color of the highlight area
a.alpha

Transparent ratio (alpha blending) of the highlight area
overlap

List of overlap labels should be avoid
master.tbl

Master table
verbose

Print some messages if TRUE
Name

Name of the DRV

Value

a ggplot2 graphic

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
